entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:50 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
